h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 1 Secret Area
content: Follow the fires toward the entrance to the arena where you'll need to fight Yaoguai Chief Guangzhi. You'll need to defeat him to gain access to the area and ring the bell. It can be found at the back of the arena.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Chapter_1_Secret_Area.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Chapter 1 Secret Area', specifically from the subsection 'Bell 1'.
The content is as follows:
Follow the fires toward the entrance to the arena where you'll need to fight Yaoguai Chief Guangzhi. You'll need to defeat him to gain access to the area and ring the bell. It can be found at the back of the arena.
